'''Naku Weed Whacker (I)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by following [[Electro Seelie]] on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in [[Inazuma]].
